abstract.t: This document defines a method to reset a server to its factory default content. The reset operation may be used, e.g., when the existing configuration has major errors so re-starting the configuration process from scratch is the best option. A new "factory-reset" RPC is defined. When resetting a device, all previous configuration settings will be lost and replaced by the factory default content. A new optional "factory-default" read-only datastore is defined, that contains the factory default configuration for the device.
